sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { OrderModel } from 'app/modules/orders/models/Order' import { actions } from '../../redux/OrdersRedux' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import { Button, Modal, Form, FormGroup, Input, Label, ModalFooter, ModalHeader, ModalBody } from "reactstrap" import {useDispatch, useSelector, shallowEqual } from 'react-redux' import { RootState } from 'setup' import { Group } from '../../models/Order' type Props = { item: OrderModel, } const EditModal: React.FC = ({ item }) => { const role: string = useSelector(({ auth }) => auth.user?.role, shallowEqual) as string || "" const adding: boolean = useSelector(({ orders }) => orders.adding, shallowEqual) as boolean || false const groups: Group[] = useSelector(({ orders }) => orders.groups, shallowEqual) as Group[] || [] const orders: OrderModel[] = useSelector(({ orders }) => orders.orders, shallowEqual) as OrderModel[] || [] const dispatch = useDispatch() const [max_thread, setMax_thread] = useState(item.max_thread) // const [view_need, setView_need] = useState(item.view_need) const [premium_rate,setPremium_rate]=useState(item.premium_rate) const [view_percent,setView_percent]=useState(item.view_percent) // const [home_rate,setHome_rate]=useState(item.home_rate) const [search_rate,setSearch_rate]=useState(item.search_rate) const [suggest_rate,setSuggest_rate]=useState(item.suggest_rate) const [direct_rate,setDirect_rate]=useState(item.direct_rate) // const [like_rate,setLike_rate]=useState(item.like_rate) const [comment_rate,setComment_rate]=useState(item.comment_rate) const [mobile_rate,setMobile_rate]=useState(item.mobile_rate) // const [note, setNote] = useState(item.note) const [keyword, setKeyword] = useState(item.keyword) const [comment_list, setComment_list] = useState(item.comment_list) const [list_video, setVideo_list] = useState('') const [group_id, setGroup] = useState(item.group_id) // const [enabled,setEnabled]=useState(item.enabled) const dismissModal = () => { dispatch(actions.clearcurrentOrder()) } const submit = () => { if (view_need % 100 !== 0 || view_need ==0) { alert("Số sub cần chạy phải chia hết cho 100") return } if(home_rate+search_rate+suggest_rate+direct_rate !=100){ alert("Tổng nguồn view không đúng") return } if(like_rate>100||like_rate<0){ alert("Tỉ lệ like không đúng") return } if(view_percent>100||view_percent<0){ alert("phần trăm xem video không đúng") return } if(comment_rate>100||comment_rate<0){ alert("Tỉ lệ comment không đúng") return } dispatch(actions.requestUpdate({ channel_id:item.channel_id, home_rate, note, direct_rate, view_need, comment_rate, mobile_rate, search_rate, enabled, list_video, max_thread, group_id, view_percent, like_rate, comment_list, suggest_rate, premium_rate, keyword })) } useEffect(() => { if (!adding) { } }, [adding]) return (
Sửa nhiệm vụ

Cài đặt danh sách đơn

Số lượng chạy

setView_need(parseInt(e.target.value))} type="number" /> setMax_thread(parseInt(e.target.value))} className="form-control form-control-solid" placeholder="ví dụ : 1000" type="number" /> setPremium_rate(parseInt(e.target.value))} className="form-control form-control-solid" placeholder="ví dụ : 1000" type="number" />

Nguồn view tổng = 100%

setHome_rate(parseInt(e.target.value))} type="number" /> setSearch_rate(parseInt(e.target.value))} type="number" /> setSuggest_rate(parseInt(e.target.value))} className="form-control form-control-solid" placeholder="ví dụ : 1000" type="number" /> setDirect_rate(parseInt(e.target.value))} className="form-control form-control-solid" placeholder="ví dụ : 1000" type="number" />

Cài đặt tương tác

setLike_rate(parseInt(e.target.value))} type="number" /> setComment_rate(parseInt(e.target.value))} type="number" /> setMobile_rate(parseInt(e.target.value))} type="number" /> setView_percent(parseInt(e.target.value))} type="number" />
setNote(e.target.value)} className="form-control form-control-solid" type={"text"} /> setComment_list(e.target.value)} className="form-control form-control-solid" style={{ height: "100px" }} type={"textarea"} /> setVideo_list(e.target.value)} className="form-control form-control-solid" style={{ height: "100px" }} type={"textarea"} /> setKeyword(e.target.value)} className="form-control form-control-solid" type={"text"} /> setGroup(parseInt(e.target.value))} className="form-control form-control-solid" type="select" value={group_id} > { groups.map((item: Group) => { return }) } setEnabled(parseInt(e.target.value))} className="form-control form-control-solid" type="select" value={enabled} >
) } export default EditModal
